column4: dclick does nothing, and right click I get mute or sound preferences, and those preferences are hardly worth a darn
the sound pref gui in 9.04 had more options. I also don't like the 9.10 one.
like what kind of networking? Internet connection sharing?
a while back someone here reverted to the 9.04 sound  prefs. I kept a note that they used https://launchpad.net/~dtl131/+archive/ppa. Maybe that will help
